attributes.action: Child rapists to receive a 10 year minimum sentence.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government todo so because of you agree most rapists re-rape this is probably due to the absolute diabolical sentences  they receive (most do 2 years or less) ! Which is absolutely shocking and vile. A harsher punishment would hopefully have an impact on these sort of criminals.
attributes.background: I would like the government to set a law meaning all child rapists will receive a 10 year instant sentence, if found guilty of raping a minor.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556664
